reviewerNotes: Minor: ActionRecord and ErrorRecord schemas added to clarify list[dict] types

Minor: State enum fully enumerated in tool schema
Addressed all 5 blockers from design-reviewer in Section 4

Revision 2: Addressed warnings with D5-D8 design decisions
Revision 3: Full JavaScript implementation in Task 4.13, explicit null handling in Task 2.10

concerns: Minor: State import location inconsistency between plan.md and tasks.md - verified tasks.md is correct (protocols.py)

reviewerNotes: Iteration 1: Initial implementation deviated from spec - used different dataclass names
Iteration 2: Added spec-required dataclasses (ActionRecord, ErrorRecord, TargetStrategy, ActionPlan, AgentContext, ExecutionResult, ValidationResult), browser extensions, ClaudeActionPlanner updates
Iteration 3: Added AIBrowserAgent spec-required methods (perceive, plan, execute, validate, self_correct, handle_state), Engine integration with agent parameter
